metadata.title: CVE-2017-5834 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - negligible.
metadata.description:
The parse_dict_node function in bplist.c in libplist allows attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds heap read and crash) via a crafted file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2017-5834` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libplist++3v5 - 1.12+git+1+e37ca00-0.3
libplist-utils - 1.12+git+1+e37ca00-0.3
libplist3 - 1.12+git+1+e37ca00-0.3
python3-plist - 1.12+git+1+e37ca00-0.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libplist package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.12+git+1+e37ca00-0.3').
